Description:
As Good As Brand New
Situated in The Kallo Estate is this stunning family home which is ready for you to simply move in and enjoy. Comprising of 3 large bedrooms (ensuite to main), open plan kitchen/meals/family, separate lounge and an alfresco entertaining area. Easy access to the Hume Freeway and close to the Donnybrook train station, local parkland, sporting ovals, the Kalkallo hotel & future local shops this property is one not to miss for the first home buyer or investor.
Featuring:
- 3 bedrooms with BIR’s
- Ensuite
- Ducted Heating & SS Cooling
- Alfresco Entertaining Area
- Double Garage (Remote and Internal Access)
- Front and rear landscaping
- Spacious walk in pantry

Description:
WHAT AN OPPORTUNITY ON 2,023m2!
Only a short drive out of Melbourne's CBD is this fantastic opportunity to enjoy the best of both worlds. A peaceful country lifestyle and yet only 33 kilometres (approx.) from the CBD, plenty of room for the truck driver with easy access onto Hume Hwy, enjoy the convenience of a short drive to local shops, Donnybrook railway station, 5 min to Craigieburn's facilities & 15 min to Epping. Let the kids run free in the safety of your own private space of 2,023m2 (approx.) with the option to re-develop (Subject To Council Approval).

Description:
Ready. Set. Build.
Titled and ready for you to build your family home.
On offer is a flat rectangular block of 576m² approx,
Located in the sought after Cloverton Estate.
Titled and ready to be built on, located only 38km from the CBD, An estate of 1200 homes approx, conveniently located near the future Mickleham Town Centre. Current plans for Estate include a primary school, sports facility, parks, playgrounds and integrated walking trails through the woodlands.
This will be on top of the already range of schools, shopping centres, recreational facilities and other amenity located nearby.
A truly wonderful opportunity to establish yourself in the developing Melbourne location of Mickleham.

Description:
Near New Home
Amazing Opportunity to buy this near new home in the most popular area of Kalkallo. The house comprises of 4 bedrooms, formal lounge, modern open plan kitchen, family area, laundry, two bathrooms and a double garage. The master has walk-in-robe with en suite and other bedrooms have built in robes.
Other features include led downlights, 900mm cooktop, rangehood, dishwasher, tone benchtop in kitchen, video intercom, security alarm, Fibre to the Home internet, secure internal access from garage and much more.
Situated in quiet location and only minutes from Hume freeway and Donnybrook train station.
Call Jatin - 0448 440 179

Description:
Brand New Home
If you appreciate purity of design and great home aesthetics then,this home is designed with you in mind and Built by Boutique Homes.The use of clean lines inside and out, gives this home an uncluttered frontage and utterly roomy informal living space. In this home the focus is on open floor plan that prominently feature expansive windows, making them perfect for using natural light to illuminate the interior of the home.
Designed to accommodate both a growing family and first home buyers.The Master comprising of a WIR'S and en suite, remaining three large Bedrooms with BIR', separate lounge, spacious open plan living area and a great kitchen featuring 900mm appliances, stone bench top & Butler's pantry.
Luxury Inclusions; Refrigerated Cooling,Ducted Heating,Down lights,High sliding doors,High windows,High ceilings and much more.

Cloverton (Stockland) Estate, Kalkallo - Minutes away from Victoria's biggest master planned community in Melbourne's North that will offer parklands, schools, shopping centres, freeway access, close to train station and easy access to all amenities. An opportunity that will not wait!

Description:
Brand New Luxury Home
This is a fantastic opportunity to purchase this brand new home in Cloverton Estate, comprising of 5 bedrooms with built in robes (master with ensuite and walk in robe), modern kitchen with walk in pantry, formal lounge, alfresco, open plan living, central bathroom, separate toilet and double remote garage.
Other features include
- Ducted Heating
- High Ceilings
- Caesar Stonebenchtops
- Dishwasher
- 900 Stainless steel appliances
- Video Intercom
- Alarm System
* Take advantage of First Home Owners Grant
* Stamp Duty Savings
* No Progress Payments
PHOTOS ARE FOR ILLUSTRATIVE PURPOSES ONLY
More New Homes and House & Land Packages are available in Wollert, Craigieburn, Mickleham and Mernda. CALL NOW TO INSPECT!

Description:
A Rare Opportunity in Cloverton
Looking to build your dream house. Look no further than this. This perfectly shaped block of land is located in one of the most popular Cloverton estates of Kalkallo.
Nestled in Melbourne's North, Cloverton offers proximity to fantastic established amenities at great price. All home sites will have outstanding access to education, retail amenity, recreational facilities and much more. Cloverton is minutes from Donnybrook Train Station with lots of
parklands, open spaces, sports grounds, it has something for every family.
- Exceptional Wide frontage 12.5 x 32 m
- Perfect rectangular size block
- Titled land of 400m2
This great piece of land at an affordable price range is suited for families or investor to add this gem to their portfolio.

Description:
Build Your Master Piece!!!
Situated in the highly sought after Cloverton Estate by Stocklands, this flat 400m2 parcel of land is nestled in the premium pocket of the development a short walk from the Cloverton display village and parks.
Close to a future Retail Centre set to be one of the largest in the northern metropolitan area, State Primary School, Private School, Proposed Regional Hospital, Medical Services and Parks.
Approximately 1.25 kms from Donnybrook Train Station and 38 kms from Melbourne CBD via Hume Freeway. 
Do not wait up to a year for off the plan releases in this red hot estate, jump the queue and build your dream home now.
